typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		months_as_customer as string,
		age as string,
		policy_number as string,
		policy_bind_date as string,
		policy_state as string,
		policy_csl as string,
		policy_deductable as string,
		policy_annual_premium as string,
		umbrella_limit as string,
		insured_zip as string,
		insured_sex as string,
		insured_education_level as string,
		insured_occupation as string,
		insured_hobbies as string,
		insured_relationship as string,
		{capital-gains} as string,
		{capital-loss} as string,
		incident_date as string,
		incident_type as string,
		collision_type as string,
		incident_severity as string,
		authorities_contacted as string,
		incident_state as string,
		incident_city as string,
		incident_location as string,
		incident_hour_of_the_day as string,
		number_of_vehicles_involved as string,
		property_damage as string,
		bodily_injuries as string,
		witnesses as string,
		police_report_available as string,
		total_claim_amount as string,
		injury_claim as string,
		property_claim as string,
		vehicle_claim as string,
		auto_make as string,
		auto_model as string,
		auto_year as string,
		fraud_reported as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> source1
source1 derive(policy_bind_date = substring(policy_bind_date,1,10)) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
